MarkdownBlockBase.ItemValue:
<properties pageTitle="d0dfde4b-7c95-4e17-940b-ee3317bbb628" description="6093ab85-98cc-41cd-9001-a14803fb68b4" services="documentdb" documentationCenter="" authors="arramac" manager="jhubbard" editor="monicar"/>
<tags ms.service="documentdb" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.workload="data-services" ms.date="08/11/2015" ms.author="arramac"/>

tr.td: Returns the distance between the two GeoJSON point expressions.
Returns a Boolean expression indicating whether the GeoJSON point specified in the first argument is within the GeoJSON polygon in the second argument.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified GeoJSON point or polygon expression is valid.
Returns a JSON value containing a Boolean value if the specified GeoJSON point or polygon expression is valid, and if invalid, additionally the reason as a string value.

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: SELECT f.id FROM Families f WHERE ST_DISTANCE(f.location, {'type': 'Point', 'coordinates':[31.9, -4.8]}) < 30000

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Schema Agnostic Indexing with Azure DocumentDB
